channel.title: Whonix "VPN only" mode
channel.description:
Can Whonix be used in a "VPN only mode"? Where Whonix acts as a gateway, as it normally does, but only routes traffic through the VPN?
Can Whonix chain multiple VPNs together?
What would the purpose of this be? Faster connections, and not abusing the Tor network for torrent traffic.

item.title: Whonix "VPN only" mode
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
rob75:

Can Whonix be used in a “VPN only mode”? Where Whonix acts as a gateway, as it normally does, but only routes traffic through the VPN?

Unsupported.

Whonix

Unsupported

What do you mean by unsupported?

rob75:

Can Whonix chain multiple VPNs together?

user -> VPN -> Tor -> VPN is easily doable. Otherwise, unsupported.

rob75:

What would the purpose of this be? Faster connections, and not abusing the Tor network for torrent traffic.

Yeah. Would be cool. Bits:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Inspiration#VPN
  • https://github.com/adrelanos/vpn-firewall

Qubes VMs can be configured as VPN-Gateways and I guess these can also be chained.

Read full topic
